alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 30 at 2:41AM MST until December 02 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. Locally higher gusts over 70 mph possible near Red Canyon. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East, Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Wind River Mountains East
